about_the_game:
This walkthrough was made for those who want guidance in their choices.

When downloaded, this DLC will activate a new button in the Preferences menu, that will add a new feature in the game : The ingame walkthrough !

This walkthrough will help the player to make the correct choices, and it is recommended that you play without it if it’s your first playthrough.

The walkthrough explain each choice and what impact it might have. Easier to choose the correct path for every Love Interest and keep tracking of the statistics.

content_descriptors.notes: The game contains depictions of nudity and sexual content. 18 years old ONLY !
